title: Per Capita Personal Consumption Expenditures: Services: Financial Services and Insurance for South Carolina
notes:
Personal consumption expenditures of a given area divided by the resident population of the area.

Spending on financial services and insurance. Financial services consist of financial services furnished without payment, and financial service charges, fees, and commissions. Insurance consists of life insurance, net household insurance, net health insurance, net motor vehicle and other transportation insurance.For more information about this release go to http://www.bea.gov/newsreleases/regional/pce/pce_newsrelease.htm.
